name: This is Not My Child?!
description:
A experimental VR game, made from a crazy brainstorming process with the theme: Existential.. Somehow we went from a VR sniper game, to a Co-op "Who is Who" game...

One takes on the role as the partner who has to pick up the kid. But as 2018 is a pretty stressfull year, you forget how your own child looks! (let's be honest, they all look pretty alike)...

Out of options, your grab the phone and call you spouse! For better or worse, your spouse has also forgotten how your kid looks! 

In best "Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes" manner, one person has to figure out how your kid looks, by comparing physical family photos and a Calendar/Journal, and communicate that through the phone, while the other grabs the baby and get's it out of the daycare!

"Fun" info: different kids toys is assets from our previous games.

FUTURE UPDATES:

Have a 3d modellen phone, the VR player has to hold to their head in order to communicate.

Game Test the rules for the non-vr partner. (allowed to say anything, more/less hints)

Time limit?

Fix animation

Make journal and photos accessible through the internet.
